title.en: Reproducing HEAT HOLAS results: Compute Assessment

description.en: Compute the Assessment (i.e. EQRS per assessment unit, grouped by overall and criterial level indicators) using HELCOM's HEAT assessment code, for a selected HOLAS assessment period. The calculation is based on the Assessment Indicators (i.e. EQRS per assessment period per assessment unit) which you have to provide as a CSV file. This tool represents the fifth and last part of the original HEAT assessment computation script.

links.title: GitHub repo for the original HEAT analysis
GitHub repo for the continued HEAT analysis

assessment_period.title: Assessment Period
assessment_period.description: The HOLAS assessment period which is used for the HEAT analysis. It can be HOLAS-2 (2011-2016) or HOLAS-3 (2016-2021) or custom for whole monitoring period (1877-9999). Note that assessment period defines the indicators used and integrations rules, where as the sample data needs to be defined separately. Allowed values: HOLAS-2, HOLAS-3, Other.

assessment_indicators.title: Assessment Indicators Table
assessment_indicators.description: CSV file of calculated EQRS per assessment period per assessment unit (AssessmentIndicators.csv).

assessment.title: Assessment Table
assessment.description: CSV file: table of calculated EQRS per assessment unit, grouped by overall and criterial level indicators (Assessment.csv).
